name: Spellthief's Escape
description:
Trapped in a dungeon with no powers of your own, you will have to rely on stealing your adversaries' spells and weapons for a chance to escape your prison.

• Fight your way through 12 chambers and face the archmage.

• Meet 4 types of enemies with different moves and behaviours.

• Steal and chain abilities together in a fast paced combat system.

This little game was created in about 2 months during our semester break and is our first substantial project.

We'd love to hear your feedback!
